text:
- Koch AG & Energy Solutions
is a global provider
for value-added solutions within
the turf and ornamental, fertilizer,
chemicals, and energy businesses.

There's a lot of information
data that is either
on assets or missing from some of those.

Understanding asset
health is critical for us
within our industry.

Our operational problem
is to really increase

overall reliability
decreasing the down days
that we have that are unplanned.
So, the Amazon Monitron system allows us

to detect anomalies that
give us better insights

into predictive
maintenance, as well as some

of the more critical
assets we've leveraged

to look out for equipment
to provide better insights
to the overall asset help.

They don't take a lot
of technical IT support
as well as operation technology support,

very simple and easy to
apply within our industry.

So the AWS tools have allowed
us to prevent downtime
which allows us to provide the products

to the customers that
need it when they need it

in a critical, seasonal,
agricultural business.
(upbeat music)
